name: Low Brass - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus Low Brass ensemble. Combined section of trombones and tubas for massive low brass impact. Perfect for epic orchestral moments and powerful bass brass foundation.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with sustained - add an articulation change entry, switching to staccatissimo - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained, then back to staccatissimo. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Low brass ensemble (trombones + tubas combined). CC1 controls dynamics for sustained. No legato available. Use velocity for staccatissimo.
